title: East Germany: beyond the Wall
creator_credit: Palmer Williams, Edward Magruder Jones and Columbia Broadcasting System Television
brief_description: Life in East Germany. The influence of the Communist Party on home life, work, churches and schools. Includes interviews with a capitalistic businessman, a pastor, an official of Rostock University and Walter Ulbricht, Chairman of East Germany’s Council of State.
